body:
When trying to install llvm (>=11.0.0) on the 0.16/develop branches, it always fails unless I specify '-j1'.  The problem is when I specify '-j1' the build takes 8+ hours.  I've tried with other levels of parallel such as '-j4','-j8',etc.. with the same results.

Here is an example of the error I'm seeing:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5723368/111384595-50cc7300-866f-11eb-8b28-890610ecd609.png)
